atariCore

Class Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • atariCore.Handler

  • public class Handler
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class which holds game objects, animates and renders them.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      private static Handler mHandler
      Class instance
      private static java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<BaseObject>> object
      Array list to hold the game's base objects.

      • mHandler

        Class instance

      • object

        private static java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<BaseObject>> object
        Array list to hold the game's base objects. We used CopyOnWriteArrayList to manipulate the objects when running within a thread.
